PageTitle: vrf-route-import compatible draft (VPN instance IPv6 address family MVPN view)
FuncDef:
The vrf-route-import compatible draft command configures the VPN Routing and Forwarding (VRF) Route Import Extended Community carried in BGP Update messages to use the format defined in an IETF draft.
The undo vrf-route-import compatible draft command restores the default configuration.
By default, the VRF Route Import Extended Community carried in BGP Update messages uses the standard packet encapsulation format defined in an relevant standard.
ParentView: VPN instance IPv6 address family MVPN view
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a non-Huawei device uses the packet encapsulation format defined in an IETF draft, run the vrf-route-import compatible draft command to enable a Huawei device to use the packet encapsulation format defined in the draft so that the Huawei and non-Huawei devices can communicate.
Precautions
When running the vrf-route-import compatible draft command, ensure that the local and remote devices use the same packet encapsulation format. Otherwise, the devices cannot communicate.
